channel.title: Experiments on Console Labs
channel.description: Recent content in Experiments on Console Labs

item.title: Neko NFT
item.author: han@console.so (Han Ngo)
item.description: tl;dr Contract: 0x7acee5d0acc520fab33b3ea25d4feef1ffebde73 Community: Discord Marketplace: PaintSwap Website: pod.town/neko The explosion of blockchain technology has given rise to numerous innovations. Among them, Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) have emerged as a frontier in the intersection between art, technology, and commerce. At the forefront of this wave is the Cyber Neko NFT experiment. We started it as our first experiment in web3. Cyber Neko NFT Cyber Neko is not just another NFT; it represents a blend of artistry, community, and technology.

item.title: WAGMI comics
item.author: han@console.so (Han Ngo)
item.description: WAGMI is a super fun webcomic all about money stuff. We make cool and funny comics with our friends neko and mochi to help everyone with life’s wild moments. Check the comics: wagmicomics.com Facebook: facebook.com/wagmicomics RSS: wagmicomics.com/rss.xml Why WAGMI? After crafting tons of finance stuff and vibing with peeps from all walks of life, it hit us – it’s not just the young guns, but the adulting crew too, who need to level up their money smarts.
